abstract: Mr. Cormier, a specialist in taking companies public, is joining the bank from Deutsche Bank.
snippet: Mr. Cormier, a specialist in taking companies public, is joining the bank from Deutsche Bank.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has hired Chris Cormier, a specialist in helping companies in the technology, media and telecommunications sectors go public, as a managing director, the firm announced on Monday in an internal memorandum.

headline.main: Bank of America Hires Technology Banker Chris Cormier

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
